name: Test Demo of '8-bit Pixel Art Side Scrolling Shooter Beginner Assets Bundle'
name_original: Test Demo of '8-bit Pixel Art Side Scrolling Shooter Beginner Assets Bundle'
description:
8-bit Pixel Art Side Scrolling Shooter Beginner Assets Bundle ($5,00)

More than 60 sprites + 17 Sound Effects + 1 Chiptune Music

This is all you need to start your own retro style side scrolling shooter. The assets has been tested on Construct 2 and it can produce already an interesting game even with the limitation of the free edition.

The assets can be used with any Game Editor tool that can manage 2D art.

DETAILED  CONTENT:

SPRITES

► x03 - Buildings                                     [one 32x64 pixels, one 16x32 and one 24x64]
► x16 - Bullets & Explosion              [starting in 8x8 pixels and ending in 16x16 pixels]
► x12 - Power Up                                   [16x8 pixels]
► x06 - UI/Bar                                          [102x3 and 104x4 pixels +life bar example 1x2 pixels]
► x25 - Vehicles                                      [8x8 pixels]
► x01 - Palette 16 colors (CGA)

SOUND EFFECTS

► x01 - Alien
► x01 - Charging       
► x04 - Explosions    
► x01 - Falling        
► x01 - Hit                
► x05 - Laser             
► x01 - Rocket              
► x03 - UFO   

MUSIC

► x01 - Chiptune (.wav format)
► x01 - Chiptune (.ogg format)

Construct 2 - Video Tutorial about this bundle (English) YouTube English Tutorial for Construct 2

Construct 2 - Video Tutorial about this bundle (Italian): YouTube Italian Tutorial for Construct 2

8-bit Pixel Art Side Scrolling Shooter Beginner Template ($25,00) 

This second additional file, contains the whole game project as it is now and it includes all the above mentioned sprites, sound effects and the music.

The file is in .capx format and works with Construct 2/3, it works even with the free version of the software
